claim_card.claim: A coherence plateau is defined by dΦ/dt → 0, interpreted as system-level stabilization and a boundary between stable and unstable regimes.
claim_card.test_hook: Estimate Φ(t) and test whether regime transitions are preceded/followed by entry/exit from dΦ/dt ≈ 0 plateaus.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: A coherence plateau: dΦ/dt → 0, indicating stabilization.
